amendatorysection.catchline: Federal rules and regulations adopted under the Investment Advisors Act of 1940 or the Securities Act of 1933, defined.
amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the Securities Act of Nebraska, federal rules and regulations adopted under the Investment Advisors Act of 1940 or the Securities Act of 1933 means such rules and regulations as they existed on January 1, 2017, except that references to Rule 147 and Rule 147A adopted under the Securities Act of 1933 shall be to such rules as published in the Federal Register on November 21, 2016.
